entities.description: Indicator of whether the respondent worked at any job or business at any time during the past 12 months.
Indicator of whether the respondent was self-employed at any time during the past 12 months.
Number of different employers, including self-employment, the respondent had in the past 12 months.
Indicator of whether there was a time when the respondent did not have at least one job or business during the past 12 months.
Number of weeks during the past 12 months when the respondent did not have at least one job or business.

relationships.description: Reflects whether the respondent worked at any job or business during the past 12 months.
Reflects whether the respondent was self-employed during the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of different employers, including self-employment, the respondent had in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether there was a time when the respondent did not have at least one job or business during the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of weeks during the past 12 months when the respondent did not have at least one job or business.
